name: Mom Clock
tagline: You said you'd do it. So why didn't you?
description: We all know what we should do. We just don‚Äôt do it. Mom Clock is a strict reminder and app blocker for people who keep negotiating with themselves. No snooze. No ‚Äújust five more minutes.‚Äù No pretending. When it‚Äôs time, distractions are blocked and action is forced ‚Äî like a mom standing behind you, watching. Built for procrastinators who are tired of disappointing themselves.

name: Qwen-Image-2512
tagline: SOTA open-source T2I model with even greater realism
description: Qwen-Image-2512 is the new open-source SOTA for text-to-image generation. It delivers drastically improved photorealism, finer natural details, and superior text rendering.

name: Its Hover
tagline: Icons that move and react mirroring user intent
description: Animated icons that move with intent.

name: intnt
tagline: Your life visualized as 1080 months
description: Most of us treat time as infinite. It's not. intnt shows your entire life as a grid of 1,080 months ‚Äî from birth to ~90 years old. Each dot is one month. Set milestones and see exactly where they fit in your remaining time. Stop planning "someday." See how much time you actually have.

name: Friendware
tagline: Tab-to-complete everywhere on MacOS
description: Friendware is not only a tab to complete everywhere. It‚Äôs a new paradigm of the proactive AI. The death of context switching, explaining yourself to and AI, and copy and pasting

name: OnlyHate
tagline: Filter out toxic positivity from social comments
description: Hides the 'Great job!' so you can focus on the 'Here's what's broken. A Chrome Extension that hides positive comments and shows you only the hate. See the worst, ignore the rest.

name: northr.ai
tagline: Adaptive AI planning for people who hate rigid systems
description: northr.ai is an adaptive planning system for people whose weeks rarely go as planned. Instead of static goals, rigid roadmaps, or endless task lists, northr.ai works in weekly cycles. You define direction once, and the system helps you adjust priorities and focus as your time, energy, and reality change. Built for founders and knowledge workers managing constant change.

name: TrueXIRR
tagline: 100% Client Side Individual Stocks XIRR Calculator
description: Free Tool: India's only XIRR calculator for Individual Stock, SIP, and SWP. See real annualized returns for stocks & mutual funds. Analyze Zerodha/Groww and other major broker tradebooks privately.

name: Co-Op
tagline: AI-Powered Advisory Platform for Startups
description: Co-Op is an open-source AI advisory platform that provides startup founders with expert guidance across multiple domains. Unlike single-model AI chatbots, Co-Op uses a unique LLM Council architecture where multiple AI models collaborate and cross-critique each other's responses to ensure accuracy and reduce hallucinations.

name: MadeLaunch
tagline: Launch your product and get discovered by early adopters
description: MadeLaunch is a community driven platform where makers launch products and get real feedback from early adopters.

name: My Invoice Generator
tagline: Free invoice generator. Instant PDFs. No login required.
description: Use our free invoice generator to create professional PDF invoices in seconds. No sign-up required, secure client-side processing, and 100% free.

name: SendToDrive
tagline: Let anyone upload files to your Google Drive
description: SendToDrive lets you collect files directly into your Google Drive using a simple upload link. No Google login required for uploaders, and no need to share your Drive access. Perfect for assignments, client files, documents, photos, or submissions. Stay organized with files sent straight to the right folder through a clean, fast, and secure upload experience.

name: GoalPlanner
tagline: Turn New Year‚Äôs resolutions into reality with action plans.
description: GoalPlanner turns vague ambitions into AI-planned action sequences. Describe a goal (e.g., ‚ÄúLearn Python in 3 months‚Äù) and get a step-by-step plan, adaptive coaching based on your progress and mood, predictive timelines (‚Äúon track to finish in 2 weeks‚Äù), and shareable progress cards for social accountability. It‚Äôs not a task manager‚Äîit‚Äôs an AI-driven goal achievement system.

name: Bachoi Ôºàwith free code for 100Ôºâ
tagline: Start the Year with Clarity. Use BaZi for Smarter Choices.
description: Discover your destiny through AI-powered BaZi analysis. Get personalized guidance based on traditional Chinese Eight Characters wisdom.

name: Phone Health pro
tagline: Professional Android Diagnostics & Valuation Suite
description: Phone Health Pro solves the trust problem in the used smartphone market. It offers 30+ advanced hardware diagnostics, AI-based device valuation, and generates professional PDF health certificates that clearly verify a phone‚Äôs condition. Buyers gain confidence by identifying hidden issues like battery degradation or sensor failures, while sellers can transparently prove device quality and avoid unfair price cuts. It positions itself as a reliable verification standard, not just testing app

name: Found By AI
tagline: Is your business invisible to AI?"
description: I started Found By AI initialy to help neurodivergent and disabed creators to be visible to AI. I have a brain tumour myself, so know how hard it can be with fatigue and the number of available daily spoons. I soon relaised that it would be better to start with the local business vertical, to gain traction and fully road test the app. There is a funnel linked to the app that gives you a guide to the fixes for a fee, or a do-it-for-you option.

name: A Flip Clock
tagline: Digital clocks designed for your big-screen TV
description: We've made a flip clock for Apple TV. The app has anti-idle turned on by default. It will also shift main block pixels periodically to prevent burn-in on OLED.

name: VYNL
tagline: Stop messy client feedback. Review websites & images live.
description: Vynl is a collaborative review tool built for designers, freelancers, and teams who review websites and images with clients. Built to reduce review friction and help teams ship faster with clarity. Features: ‚Ä¢ Add pin and box annotations ‚Ä¢ Add comments and attach photos ‚Ä¢ Track status: open, pending, resolved ‚Ä¢ Manage revisions and collect sign-offs/revision ‚Ä¢ Invite team members and clients ‚Ä¢ Comments and annotations appear live without refreshing üëâ https://vynl.in

name: AudioScribe
tagline: World's first workflow-integrated AI transcription platform
description: AudioScribe revolutionizes transcription with the world's first end-to-end workflow platform and delivers a complete pipeline: **transcribe ‚Üí analyze ‚Üí automate**.AudioScribe combines accurate multi-language transcription with **12 specialized AI summary templates** covering everything from Interview Briefs to Sales Call Analysis to Meeting Notes. The platform uniquely offers **one-click workflow automation** to Notion and 5,000+ apps via Zapier.

name: Magnet
tagline: Make Your Video Impossible to Ignore
description: Generate high-CTR thumbnails backed by data from millions of viral videos.
